layer_sequence_y: With this function you can set the position along the Y (vertical) axis of the room for the given sequence element. You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the Y position to set and the sequence will be moved to the new position.
The unique ID value of the sequence element to target
The Y position to move the sequence element to
The above code checks to see if the sequence element referenced in the variable "my_seq" exists, and if it does it sets the x/y position to the that of the instance running the code.
